text:
The Florida Department of Corrections[1] is divided into four regions, each representing a specific geographical area of the state. Region I[2] is the panhandle area, Region II[3] is the north-east and north-central areas, Region III[4] consist of central Florida and Region IV [1] which covers the southern portion of the peninsula.
Dade Correctional Institution / Homestead Correctional Institution
There are several types of facilities in Florida, ranging from community work release centers to maximum security institutions.
trans:
Le Département des corrections de la Floride[1] est divisé en quatre régions, chacune représentant une zone géographique spécifique de l'État. La région I[2] correspond à la région de la côte nord-ouest, la région II[3] couvre les zones nord-est et centre-nord, la région III[4] englobe le centre de la Floride et la région IV[1] couvre la portion sud de la péninsule.
Institution correctionnelle de Dade / Institution correctionnelle de Homestead
Il existe plusieurs types d'établissements en Floride, allant des centres de libération conditionnelle communautaire aux institutions de sécurité maximale.
